select
from ly_user where 1 = 1
and accountName like '%${accountName}%'
order by ${column} ${sort}

select
from ly_user where id in (select user_child_id from tb_user_relation WHERE user_parent_id = ${userId})

from ly_user where id in (select userId from ly_user_role where roleId in (select id from ly_role where parentId in (${roleIds}))) and id not in (select user_child_id from tb_user_relation WHERE user_parent_id = ${userId});
